title: Inception
overview: A thief who enters the dreams of others to steal their secrets from their subconscious.

title: The Shawshank Redemption
overview: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

title: Oldboy
overview: After being kidnapped and imprisoned for 15 years, Oh Dae-Su is released, only to find that he must find his captor in 5 days.

title: La Haine
overview: Three friends face the brutality of the police and their own despair in the Paris suburbs.

title: Chungking Express
overview: Two stories of romance set in Hong Kong, one about a lovesick cop and the other about a mysterious woman.

title: Perfect Days
overview: A toilet cleaner in Tokyo leads a simple and tranquil life, but his encounters with different people make him reflect on himself

title: Joker
overview: In Gotham City, mentally troubled comedian Arthur Fleck is disregarded and mistreated by society. He then embarks on a downward spiral of revolution and bloody crime.

title: Oppenheimer
overview: A biopic about the American theoretical physicist J. Robert Oppenheimer, who was the wartime head of the Los Alamos Laboratory and is known as the father of the atomic bomb.

title: Dead Poets Society
overview: English teacher John Keating inspires his students to look at poetry with a different perspective of authentic knowledge and feelings.
